subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Max Jones, the longtime general manager of Roush Fenway Racing, has moved to Yates Racing as a co-owner and general manager, with the veteran crew chief Robbie Reiser stepping into his former job.Jones became general manager for Jack Roush’s team in 1992. During his tenure, the team won the 2003 Nascar Nextel Cup title, as well as championships in the Craftsman Truck Series, road racing and, this year, the Busch Series title.
